name: Light Orb
description:
Light Orb is a digital sound experience, in which particles and sound dynamically interact with eachother. The player controls it intuitively via gamepad and is encouraged to experiment with the various buttons. To make it easier, and to show what's possible, we mapped some presets on the face buttons and d-pad. 
Now it's up to you, go experiment!

This was developed for the module "Game Art" at Game Design ZHdK.
